alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 2:58PM CDT until April 04 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHARITON AND NORTH CENTRAL SALINE COUNTIES... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keytesville, or 11 miles northwest of Salisbury, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Keytesville, Rothville and Dalton. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
